history.note: Optimization Window: Applied Negative Keywords (free, textbook, workbook, audiobook, novel, fiction) and harvested 'Practical Psychology' as Exact Match.

keywords.reason: High spend, zero conversions — paused Feb 21

campaigns.name: Auto Discovery
campaigns.notes: Discovery — mine search term report for winners

optimizationLog.detail: Paused broad keyword 'branding' — high spend, zero conversions

recommendations.title: Implement 3-Pillar Campaign Structure
recommendations.detail: Currently only 1 auto campaign. Add Pillar 2 (Manual Exact — proven winners) and Pillar 3 (Brand Defense — your title + author name). This is the industry standard for book ads.

recommendations.title: Add Competitor Author Targeting
recommendations.detail: Target searches for: Daniel Kahneman, Dan Ariely, Robert Cialdini, Malcolm Gladwell. These readers are pre-qualified for behavioral psychology content.

recommendations.title: Add Negative Keywords
recommendations.detail: Block: 'free', 'textbook', 'workbook', 'audiobook' (if not on Audible), 'novel', 'fiction'. Stops wasted spend on non-buyers.

recommendations.title: ASIN Target Competitor Book Pages
recommendations.detail: Run product ads on detail pages of: Thinking Fast and Slow, Predictably Irrational, The Power of Habit, Influence, Blink. Your ad appears to readers already interested in behavioral psychology.

recommendations.title: Review Bids After 2-Week Data Window
recommendations.detail: Attribution lag means current data is incomplete. After Feb 26, review search term report: raise bids 10-15% on keywords with 5+ clicks and 1+ sale. Pause anything with 10+ clicks and zero KENP or sales.

recommendations.title: A/B Test Ad Copy
recommendations.detail: Test two hooks: (1) Cialdini angle 'The book Cialdini fans read next' vs (2) Outcome angle 'Make better decisions every day'. BookLife 10/10 badge is a strong credibility signal — use it.
